summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Budget Tracker app. Fixed critical SelectItem bug in Budget Goals. All major features working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend API connectivity and all CRUD operations (28/28 tests passed)
Dashboard loads with all stats cards (Total Income, Total Expenses, Net Balance, Transactions)
Dashboard shows charts (Monthly Overview, Expenses by Category)
Dashboard displays recent transactions with real data
Categories page loads and displays seeded categories
Categories filtering by income/expense type works
Category creation dialog opens and functions correctly
Transactions page loads with search and filter functionality
Transaction creation dialog works with category selection
Transaction search and filtering by type works
Budget goal creation works after SelectItem fix
Budget goal displays with progress bar and status indicators
Navigation between all pages works correctly
Mobile responsive design with working sidebar
Toast notifications appear for success actions
